qas.question: Who flew to the earthquake area 90 minutes after it hit?
What was Premier Wen Jiabao's background in?
What did Jiabao oversee in the region?
How many troops were dispatched by the Chengdu military?
How soon after the earthquake was Premier Wen Jiabao on his way to the area?
How many medical teams were sent to Wenchuan county?
How many troops were sent to the area for relief work?
Besides the rough terrain, why was it difficult to get to the area?

context: General Secretary and President Hu Jintao announced that the disaster response would be rapid. Just <a4_0>90 minutes after<a4_0/> the earthquake, <a0_0>Premier Wen Jiabao<a0_0/>, who has an academic background in <a1_0>geomechanics<a1_0/>, flew to the earthquake area to oversee <a2_0>the rescue work<a2_0/>. Soon afterward, the Ministry of Health said that it had sent <a5_0>ten<a5_0/> emergency medical teams to Wenchuan County. On the same day, the Chengdu Military Region Command dispatched <a3_0><a6_0>50,000<a6_0/><a3_0/> troops and armed police to help with disaster relief work in Wenchuan County. However, due to the rough terrain and close <a7_0>proximity of the quake's epicenter<a7_0/>, the soldiers found it very difficult to get help to the rural regions of the province.
